title: How to save the post office
description:
The postal service is in trouble. It may be hard to imagine such an essential part of society not existing anymore, but agency could run out of money next year. Recode’s deputy editor, Adam Clark Estes explains why and the possibly ways to save it.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
